oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Central High School Class of 1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Storm Photo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stein, Irene Miller,--1894-2000
Central High School (Denver, Colo.)
Storm Photo
Classes (Groups of students)
High schools
Jewish children
Group portraits
Denver (Colo.)
Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Printed on a seal on the matting: ''Storm Photo.'' Handwritten on the back: ''#725, Irene Stein, Central High school, Denver, 1909.''

Students pose sitting and standing in front of the entrance to Central High School in Denver, Colorado for a class photograph. Irene Miller (Stein) is one of the students, possibly in the middle of the top row indicated by an arrow.
The photograph was donated by Irene Miller Stein.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ice Cream Outing to Denver Ice Cream Brick and Dainty Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alpert, Joseph,--1896-1977
Alpert, Betty Rottman
Denver Ice Cream Brick and Dainty Co. (Denver, Colo)
St. John's Episcopal Cathedral (Denver, Colo.)
Social life and customs
Jewish men
Jewish women
Group portraits
Denver (Colo.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 108.

Typed on the back of the photograph: ''2. A group of friends at an outing, c. 1917.'' Handwritten on the back of the photograph: ''Mr. and Mrs. Joe Alpert and friends, c. 1917, Donor Mr. Arnold Alpert, See mount board separately.''

Joe and Betty Alpert (fourth and fifth from left) are shown in a social outing with friends to the Denver Ice Cream Brick and Dainty Co. at 719 13th street in Denver (Colo.) Behind the group of twenty men and women are cars, the Denver Ice Cream Company building, a multi storied home, and Saint John's Episcopal Cathedral. On the building is a sign ''Denver Ice Cream Brick and Dainty Co.,'' and signs ''Bricks 5¢ -- Dainties 1¢.'' Three men stand in the doorway of the Denver Ice Cream building.
Donated by Arnold Alpert in December 1977.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 item (photograph), 6 x 14 inches, black and white
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
